message.body: Hi! Are you still on campus by any chance?
I left campus yesterday. I'm currently waiting in a broken a/c area of the airport to board my plane lol. What's up?
Haha okay :) if you were I'd want to see you! Safe travels and don't die of heat stroke :P
I hope I don't develop heat stroke! Lol. I'll be back for alumni weekend and then mid-June and all of July. We should get together then!!! Have you been enjoying your birthday so far?
Yes! :) I will be in Philly starting June first so I will have to see you then
Awesome! I'm Seattle bound. Enjoy the rest of the day! :-)
